transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Yes, that's me.
Got it. Can you please provide your date of birth?
Out of Felix. How may I help you today?
I would like to see Dr. Martinez for back pain.
We don't have a doctor Martinez at Pivot Point Orthopedics.
Can you schedule me with any available provider?
Got it, let me check the soonest. Available appointments for back pain with any provider.
Sure, take your time.
There are no openings for new patient consultations in the next week. Would you like to look for appointments later in March or a specific date that works for you?
Can you check for any available appointments in March?
Okay, I'll check for new patient consultation openings with any provider starting in March 30th.
Sure thing, I'm here.
The next available appointment is Thursday, March 5th at 9:45 a.m. with Dr. Bricker
I asked for an appointment starting in March 30th, not March 5th.
You want to look for opening starting March 30th.
Yes, please check for openings starting March 30th.
The next available appointment is Monday March 30th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Bricker would you like to book the slot or hear about other times that day?
I would like to book the slot on March 30th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Bricker.
Just to confirm you want to book Monday March 30th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Bricker for a new patient consultation about back pain. Is that correct?
Yes, that's correct.
Your appointment is set for Monday. March 30th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Bricker please bring your government issue, photo ID and your insurance card.
No, that's all. Thank you.
